price: E menciona, no Livro, a Idris - por certo, ele era veracíssimo, profeta.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِدۡرِيسَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi id'rīsa innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
